CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 The polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with PzNDTTPD as donor and [6,6]-phenyl-C71-butyric acid methyl ester ( PC71BM ) as acceptor demonstrated a PCE of 5.26% with a high V oc of 0.91 V compared to the linear NDT - TPD - based copolymer PNDTTPD with a PCE of 4.0% and a V oc of 0.69 V. 15 Meanwhile , high - performance p-channel fieldeffect transistors with hole mobility of 0.067 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 and an on / off current ratio of 10^9 -10^10 were obtained.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTTPD |
| PC71BM |
| NDT - TPD |
| PNDTTPD |
| p-channel fieldeffect transistors |

The entities are:

* PzNDTTPD
* PC71BM
* NDT - TPD
* PNDTTPD
* p-channel fieldeffect transistors

These are the material names mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTTPD |
| PC71BM |
| NDT - TPD |
| p-channel fieldeffect transistors |

The entities are:

* PzNDTTPD
* PC71BM
* NDT - TPD
* p-channel fieldeffect transistors

I have removed PNDTTPD as it is a copolymer of NDT-TPD, and the paragraph mentions both NDT-TPD and PNDTTPD. To avoid redundancy, I have kept NDT-TPD in the list.
